item.description:
32nd Annual Barrel Tasting

May 14th - 15th, Saturday & Sunday, Noon - 5PM, Rain or Shine.

  • Wine Tasting
  • Barrel Samples
  • Artisan Cheese, Paté and Fresh fruit Sampling
  • Local Artisan Food Sampling
  • Live Music
  • Complimentary Hopkins Vineyard Wine Glass
  • Daily admission is $27 per person at the door, or purchase advance tickets online until May 11th for $22 per person.
  • Children under 12 free, non-alcoholic drinks provided for those under 21.
  • Gold Level Highland Wine Club Members receive two free admissions
  • May case sale - 15% off cases purchases.
  • I would bring a blanket and picnic around the little creek at the Vineyard :-)
item.why: I attended this last year - Hopkins Vineyard is just beautiful in the spring - one of the best events of the year :-) Remember to bring your own plates and cups because the Cheese - Pate' and Fruit buffet is just scrumptious.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "32" Hopkins Vineyard Wine Festival "This is a Fantastic Wine Event"
